title: I am 13, height 1.71cm, weight 71kg (m on a strict diet), and I’m 100% non-Asian but I really look like an Asian talent in singing, acting, dancing, and I can rap a little bit. Can I audition for YG? - Quora

response.answer_text: yg no. smaller companies, maybe. koreans cant even pass, what makes you think that a non asian will at a big three company. smaller ones are the best option i think. good luck<3
